submission:
class Solution:
    def minFlips(self, grid: List[List[int]]) -> int:
        """
        一次改变，同时影响行列回文性质
        从全0开始，对角线型遍历
        """
        m=len(grid)
        n=len(grid[0])
        res=0
        for i in range(m//2):
            for j in range(n//2):
                ct=grid[i][j]+grid[m-i-1][j]+grid[i][n-1-j]+grid[m-1-i][n-1-j]
                res+=min(ct,4-ct)
        ct1=0#全1
        ct0=0#必须翻转
        print(f"{m=},{n=},{res=}")
        if n&1:
            for i in range(m//2):
                if grid[i][n//2]!=grid[m-1-i][n//2]:
                    ct0+=1
                else:ct1+=grid[i][n//2]
        # if ct1&1:
        #     if ct0:
        #         res+=ct0
        #     else:res+=2
        # else:
        #     res+=ct0
        # print(f"{res=},{ct0=},{ct1=}")
        # ct0,ct1=0,0#行列独立
        if m&1:#变成0
            for i in range(n//2):
                if grid[m//2][i]!=grid[m//2][n-1-i]:
                    ct0+=1
                else:
                    ct1+=grid[m//2][i]
        
        if (m&1) and (n&1):#是1时必须翻转
            res+=grid[m//2][n//2]
        if ct1&1:
            if ct0:
                res+=ct0
            else:res+=2
        else:
            res+=ct0
        print(f"{res=},{ct0=},{ct1=}")
        # res+=2*(ct1&1)
        return res
